casebody.data:
MAYFIELD
v.
HANNIFIN, et al. No. 699P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. M. Duane Jones, Jeff Kadis, Charlotte, for Parker Hannifin. Linda Hartwell, Kathleen Sumner, Greensboro, for Willie Mayfield.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of February 2006 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
